description.zh-cn: 东汉末年曹操与袁绍之间的一场关键战役。曹操以少胜多，击溃袁绍主力，为统一中国北方奠定了基础。
description.en: A pivotal battle between the warlords Cao Cao and Yuan Shao in the late Eastern Han dynasty. Cao Cao's decisive victory against a numerically superior foe laid the foundation for his unification of Northern China.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年重要的政治家、军事家、文学家。官渡之战的胜利方指挥官。
description.en: An important statesman, general, and poet of the late Eastern Han dynasty. The victorious commander in the Battle of Guandu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年群雄之一，河北地区的最大势力。在官渡之战中被曹操击败。
description.en: A major warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty who controlled the territories in northern China. Defeated by Cao Cao in the Battle of Guandu.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍的谋士。在官渡之战中进谗言陷害张郃、高览，导致二人投降曹操。
description.en: An advisor to Yuan Shao. During the Battle of Guandu, his slander against Zhang He and Gao Lan caused them to defect to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍的谋士兼监军。官渡之战中提出持久作战的建议未被采纳，战后被曹操俘虏并杀害。
description.en: An advisor and army supervisor under Yuan Shao. His suggestion of a protracted war strategy was ignored during the Battle of Guandu. He was captured and later killed by Cao Cao after the battle.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍的谋士。因在官渡之战前直言劝谏而被袁绍下狱，战败后被杀害。
description.en: An advisor to Yuan Shao. He was imprisoned by Yuan Shao for his blunt advice before the Battle of Guandu and was executed after Yuan's defeat.

description.zh-cn: 原为袁绍的谋士，官渡之战期间因家人被审配下狱而投奔曹操，并献计奇袭乌巢，成为曹操获胜的关键。
description.en: Originally an advisor to Yuan Shao, he defected to Cao Cao during the Battle of Guandu after his family was imprisoned by Shen Pei. He proposed the surprise attack on Wuchao, which was key to Cao Cao's victory.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍的谋士，负责统军事宜。
description.en: An advisor to Yuan Shao, responsible for military administration.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍的谋士。官渡之战后诋毁田丰，导致田丰被杀。
description.en: An advisor to Yuan Shao. After the Battle of Guandu, he slandered Tian Feng, leading to Tian Feng's execution.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍麾下大将。在白马之战中被关羽所杀。
description.en: A prominent general under Yuan Shao. He was killed by Guan Yu at the Battle of Boma.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍麾下大将。在延津之战中战死。
description.en: A prominent general under Yuan Shao. He was killed in action at the Battle of Yanjin.

description.zh-cn: 原为袁绍麾下大将，在乌巢被劫后，受郭图谗言陷害，与高览一同投降曹操。
description.en: Originally a general under Yuan Shao, he defected to Cao Cao along with Gao Lan after being slandered by Guo Tu following the raid on Wuchao.

description.zh-cn: 原为袁绍麾下大将，与张郃一同投降曹操。
description.en: Originally a general under Yuan Shao, he defected to Cao Cao along with Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍麾下大将。在乌巢之战中负责护送军粮，因曹操的奇袭而战败被杀。
description.en: A general under Yuan Shao. He was tasked with guarding the army's grain supply at Wuchao, but was defeated and killed during Cao Cao's surprise attack.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍长子。官渡之战后与弟袁尚争位，后被曹操所杀。
description.en: Eldest son of Yuan Shao. After the Battle of Guandu, he fought with his brother Yuan Shang for succession and was later killed by Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 汉末群雄之一，蜀汉开国皇帝。官渡之战前依附曹操，后叛离并短暂投靠袁绍，战役中途脱离。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the founding emperor of Shu Han. Before the Battle of Guandu, he was allied with Cao Cao, then rebelled and briefly joined Yuan Shao, leaving midway through the campaign.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的义弟。徐州战败后短暂归降曹操，在白马之战中斩杀颜良，后离开曹操重归刘备。
description.en: Sworn brother of Liu Bei. Briefly surrendered to Cao Cao after the defeat at Xuzhou. He slew Yan Liang at the Battle of Boma and later left Cao Cao to rejoin Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的主要谋士和战略家。在官渡之战期间留守许都，并写信鼓励曹操坚守，对战局有重要影响。
description.en: A key advisor and strategist for Cao Cao. During the Battle of Guandu, he guarded the capital Xudu and wrote to Cao Cao, encouraging him to hold his ground, which had a significant impact on the outcome.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的谋士。在官渡之战中献计声东击西，帮助曹操解白马之围。
description.en: An advisor to Cao Cao. During the Battle of Guandu, he proposed the strategy of feinting east and attacking west, helping Cao Cao lift the siege of Boma.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的谋士。在官渡之战前分析了曹袁双方的优劣，增强了曹操阵营的信心。
description.en: An advisor to Cao Cao. Before the Battle of Guandu, he analyzed the strengths and weaknesses of both Cao Cao and Yuan Shao, boosting the confidence of Cao Cao's camp.

description.zh-cn: 原为张绣谋士，后随张绣投降曹操。在官渡之战中为曹操效力。
description.en: Originally an advisor to Zhang Xiu, he surrendered to Cao Cao along with Zhang Xiu. He served Cao Cao during the Battle of Guandu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，在官渡之战前听从贾诩建议投降曹操。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han Dynasty who, on Jia Xu's advice, surrendered to Cao Cao before the Battle of Guandu.

description.zh-cn: 曹操麾下大将。在官渡之战中负责骚扰袁军的补给线。
description.en: A prominent general under Cao Cao. During the Battle of Guandu, he was responsible for harassing Yuan Shao's supply lines.

description.zh-cn: 曹操麾下大将，在白马之战中与关羽一同担任先锋。
description.en: A prominent general under Cao Cao, who served as a vanguard alongside Guan Yu at the Battle of Boma.

description.zh-cn: 曹操麾下大将。参与了乌巢之战的奇袭，并斩杀了淳于琼。
description.en: A prominent general under Cao Cao. He participated in the surprise attack on Wuchao and killed Chunyu Qiong.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的堂弟，麾下大将。在官渡之战期间负责部署许都防务，并击败了受袁绍派遣的刘备。
description.en: A cousin and prominent general of Cao Cao. During the Battle of Guandu, he was responsible for the defense of Xudu and defeated Liu Bei, who was sent by Yuan Shao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的堂弟，麾下大将。在乌巢之战期间留守官渡大营。
description.en: A cousin and prominent general of Cao Cao. During the attack on Wuchao, he was responsible for defending the main camp at Guandu.

en: Warlord contention at the end of the Eastern Han dynasty

description.zh-cn: 东汉末期，中央政权衰落，地方军阀崛起，相互征伐，形成割据局面。官渡之战是此期间的重要事件。
description.en: A period in the late Eastern Han dynasty characterized by the decline of the central government and the rise of regional warlords who fought amongst themselves for territory. The Battle of Guandu was a major event during this era.

en: Cao Cao's unification of Northern China

description.zh-cn: 曹操在官渡之战胜利后，通过一系列军事行动，逐步消灭北方各割据势力，最终统一中国北方的过程。
description.en: Following his victory at the Battle of Guandu, Cao Cao launched a series of military campaigns to eliminate rival warlords and gradually unify Northern China.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战的前哨战，曹操军在此战中声东击西，关羽斩杀袁绍大将颜良，解白马之围。
description.en: A preliminary engagement of the Battle of Guandu, where Cao Cao's forces used a feint to lift the siege of Boma, during which Guan Yu slew Yuan Shao's general Yan Liang.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战中的一场战斗，曹操以少量骑兵击败袁绍追兵，并斩杀大将文丑。
description.en: A battle during the Guandu campaign where Cao Cao used a small cavalry force to defeat Yuan Shao's pursuing troops and killed his general Wen Chou.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战的转折点。曹操采纳许攸之计，率轻兵夜袭并焚毁袁军在乌巢的粮仓，导致袁军崩溃。
description.en: The turning point of the Battle of Guandu. Acting on Xu You's advice, Cao Cao led a small force on a night raid to burn Yuan Shao's supply depot at Wuchao, leading to the collapse of Yuan's army.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍三子。官渡之战后与兄袁谭争位，最终兵败，投奔辽东后被公孙康所杀。
description.en: The third son of Yuan Shao. After the Battle of Guandu, he fought with his brother Yuan Tan for succession, was ultimately defeated, and was killed by Gongsun Kang after fleeing to Liaodong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年辽东地区的统治者。为向曹操示好，杀害了前来投奔的袁尚。
description.en: The ruler of the Liaodong region during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He killed the fugitive Yuan Shang as a gesture of goodwill to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战是东汉末年群雄割据时期的一场重要战役。
description.en: The Battle of Guandu was a major battle during the period of warlord contention at the end of the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在官渡之战中，袁绍与曹操是敌对双方的指挥官。
description.en: In the Battle of Guandu, Yuan Shao and Cao Cao were the commanders of the opposing forces.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战的胜利奠定了曹操统一中国北方的基础。
description.en: The victory in the Battle of Guandu laid the foundation for Cao Cao's unification of Northern China.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍在官渡之战中主力被歼，元气大伤，失去了与曹操争夺天下的能力。
description.en: Yuan Shao's main force was annihilated in the Battle of Guandu, severely weakening him and costing him the ability to contend with Cao Cao for supremacy.

description.zh-cn: 曹操采纳荀攸声东击西之计，成功突袭白马，解白马之围。
description.en: Cao Cao adopted Xun You's strategy of feinting east and attacking west, successfully launching a surprise attack on Boma and lifting its siege.

description.zh-cn: 在白马之战中，关羽于阵间斩杀颜良。
description.en: During the Battle of Boma, Guan Yu slew Yan Liang in the midst of his army.

description.zh-cn: 文丑在延津之战中被曹操军击杀。
description.en: Wen Chou was killed by Cao Cao's forces during the Battle of Yanjin.

description.zh-cn: 在官渡相持阶段，曹操军粮将尽，一度考虑退兵。荀彧写信劝说曹操坚守，认为战机将至，不可坐失。
description.en: During the stalemate at Guandu, when Cao Cao's supplies were running low and he considered retreating, Xun Yu wrote a letter persuading him to hold his position, arguing that a critical opportunity was imminent and should not be missed.

description.zh-cn: 许攸从袁绍阵营投奔曹操，并献上奇袭袁军粮仓乌巢之计，成为官渡之战的转折点。
description.en: Xu You defected from Yuan Shao's camp to Cao Cao and proposed a plan for a surprise attack on the Yuan army's supply depot at Wuchao, which became the turning point of the Battle of Guandu.

description.zh-cn: 曹操采纳许攸之计，亲自率领五千精兵夜袭乌巢，发动了乌巢之战。
description.en: Adopting Xu You's plan, Cao Cao personally led 5,000 elite troops on a night raid of Wuchao, launching the Battle of Wuchao.

description.zh-cn: 淳于琼在乌巢之战中被曹操军击败并斩杀。
description.en: Chunyu Qiong was defeated and killed by Cao Cao's forces during the Battle of Wuchao.

description.zh-cn: 根据《三国志·乐进传》记载，乐进在乌巢之战中斩杀了淳于琼。
description.en: According to the Records of the Three Kingdoms, Biography of Yue Jin, Yue Jin killed Chunyu Qiong during the Battle of Wuchao.

description.zh-cn: 乌巢失守后，郭图为推卸责任而向袁绍进谗言陷害张郃，导致张郃投降曹操。
description.en: After the fall of Wuchao, Guo Tu slandered Zhang He to Yuan Shao to shift blame, causing Zhang He to defect to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 乌巢失守后，郭图为推卸责任而向袁绍进谗言陷害高览，导致高览与张郃一同投降曹操。
description.en: After the fall of Wuchao, Guo Tu slandered Gao Lan to Yuan Shao to shift blame, causing Gao Lan to defect to Cao Cao along with Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 在官渡之战中，张郃因受郭图谗言所害，遂率部投降曹操。
description.en: During the Battle of Guandu, Zhang He, having been slandered by Guo Tu, led his troops to surrender to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 在官渡之战中，高览因受郭图谗言所害，与张郃一同投降曹操。
description.en: During the Battle of Guandu, Gao Lan, having been slandered by Guo Tu, surrendered to Cao Cao along with Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战后，袁绍后悔不听田丰之言，但逢纪借机诋毁田丰，导致田丰被袁绍杀害。
description.en: After the Battle of Guandu, Yuan Shao regretted not listening to Tian Feng's advice, but Feng Ji took the opportunity to slander Tian Feng, which led to Yuan Shao executing him.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍在官渡之战失败后，听信逢纪谗言，将田丰杀害。
description.en: After his defeat at the Battle of Guandu, Yuan Shao listened to Feng Ji's slander and executed Tian Feng.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战后，沮授被曹操俘虏，因其拒绝投降并企图逃回袁绍处而被曹操所杀。
description.en: After the Battle of Guandu, Ju Shou was captured by Cao Cao. He was executed after refusing to surrender and attempting to escape back to Yuan Shao.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍死后，袁谭与袁尚为争夺继承权而互相攻击。
description.en: After Yuan Shao's death, Yuan Tan and Yuan Shang fought each other for succession.

description.zh-cn: 袁尚兵败后投奔辽东，被太守公孙康杀害。
description.en: After his defeat, Yuan Shang fled to Liaodong, where he was killed by the administrator Gongsun Kang.
